reference.title: List of manned moon landings
reference.shortdesc: There have been six crewed moon landings, all part of NASA's Apollo program.

section.p: The missions and their landing dates are:
NASA's Artemis III mission is currently scheduled for September 2026. This will be the first crewed landing on the Moon since Apollo 17 in 1972.

note.p: This content was sourced from GenAI.
